channel.title: Slick2D or really any Java refrence for a GUI
channel.description: When creating a GUI for maybe a player's username above their head or an action bar at the bottom of the screen, would you just go from the basic Graphics2D class and build the GUI from there or would something else be required?

item.title: Slick2D or really any Java refrence for a GUI
item.dc:creator: @christomaxs christomaxs
item.description:
@christomaxs wrote:

Well things like the name above the head idea would most likely be able to work from just a class you would throw together, But for an action bar I’m pretty sure that slick2d comes with its own GUI library but it might help to bring in a separate library to help ease the process. http://twl.l33tlabs.org/ I’ve used this one before in a few of my projects and I honestly like it, it might take a little bit to learn but in my opinion it will really help! Someone will say different, and I’m not the best java programmer but hopefully that can help you out some.

Read full topic
item.source: Slick2D or really any Java refrence for a GUI
